name: Japanese Vocabulary Quiz
description:
Have trouble finding the time to study vocabulary? No problem! This extension will quiz you on a word everytime that you open or close a tab, helping expand your vocabulary without needing to set aside time specifically for studying. Create your own lists with our interface, or upload an existing Comma-Separated-Values (CSV) file.

Questions? Comments? Please let us know by contacting lphk92@gmail.com 

Interested in contributing to the project? Source code available at https://github.com/lphk92/JapaneseVocabExtension
